content:
@Brian Alper There is only one value in this value set. Is that not done yet? I thought it would have the same values as cited-artifact-classification-type valueset
http://build.fhir.org/valueset-citation-classification-type.html

There is only one value so far. The value set binding is currently Extensible -- maybe Example is better. We distinguished the Citation from the citedArtifact. It is not clear if the Citation itself will have a heavy use of classification element. However we discovered one additional code needed (medline-owner) as we evaluate the MEDLINE citations which contains a classification for who "own" the citation within that system.
